Style.name: tracks
Style.Rule: &maxscale_zoom12; &minscale_zoom13; [highway] = 'track' and ([surface] = 'asphalt' or [surface] = 'paved' or [surface] = 'concrete' or [surface] = 'paving_stones' or [smoothness] = 'excellent' or [smoothness] = 'good' or [tracktype] = 'grade1')

&maxscale_zoom13; &minscale_zoom13; [highway] = 'track' and not ([surface] = 'asphalt' or [surface] = 'paved' or [surface] = 'concrete' or [surface] = 'paving_stones' or [smoothness] = 'excellent' or [smoothness] = 'good' or [tracktype] = 'grade1')

&maxscale_zoom14; &minscale_zoom18; [highway] = 'track' and ([surface] = 'asphalt' or [surface] = 'paved' or [surface] = 'concrete' or [surface] = 'paving_stones' or [smoothness] = 'excellent' or [smoothness] = 'good' or ([smoothness] = null and [tracktype] = 'grade1'))
